sumComplementaries

public double sumComplementaries(T element,
                                 double value,
                                 Double extra)
Computes the sum of the k best tracked costs, excluding the cost of the provided element and optionally including an extra (untracked) cost. If extra is not null, then this cost is treated as if it pertained to the list of costs to consider, but without modifying the list of tracked costs. If the given element's cost is not within the best k costs, then the returned value is the sum of those best k costs. Otherwise, the result is the sum of the k+1 best costs minus the given element's cost.

Parameters:
element - element to exclude from the sum.
value - value of the excluded element.
extra - optional additional element to consider.
Returns:
sum of the best k costs, excluding the given element

track

public void track(T element,
                  double value)
Track an element and its associated value.

Parameters:
element - element to track.
value - value of this element.
